item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded:
NEW: Improved Reporting Dashboard with MonsterInsights 7.0
You asked for it, here it is. MonsterInsights 7.0 comes with beautiful new reporting dashboard.

We have created custom reports for Publishers, eCommerce store owners, Google Search Console, and Custom Dimensions. You also have the ability to choose custom date ranges.

Click Here to Upgrade » Read the Full Announcement

Thanks as always for your continuous support of MonsterInsights!
Chris Christoff
Lead Developer of MonsterInsights

[siteorigin_widget class="WP_Widget_Custom_HTML"][/siteorigin_widget]
[siteorigin_widget class="WP_Widget_Media_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
[siteorigin_widget class="subscribe_Services_Type_A"][/siteorigin_widget]

What Subscribe Pro is All About

[siteorigin_widget class="WP_Widget_Media_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]

If you’ve ever wondered:

“Where can I find actionable SEO advice that gets results?”, you’re in the right place.

Subscribe Pro is where professional marketers turn for proven SEO advice.

My effective SEO advice is why marketers from companies like Apple, Disney, IBM, and Amazon subscribe to my email newsletter.

And my results-focused approach to SEO is likely why Inc recently said: “John Smith is a really smart SEO guy who knows what’s he’s talking about because he lives it every day.”

[siteorigin_widget class="subscribe_Newsletter_Widget"][/siteorigin_widget]

How Subscribe Pro Helps You Get Higher Rankings & More Traffic

[siteorigin_widget class="WP_Widget_Media_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]

Most so-called “SEO experts” say: “To succeed with SEO, all you need to do is create great content.”

If only it were that easy…

I learned the hard way that there’s a lot more to SEO than “great content”.

And that’s where Subscribe Pro comes in.

This blog is where I show you the exact tips, strategies and techniques you need to get higher rankings. No fluff or “high-level” advice. Just insanely actionable advice that works.

Oh, while you’re here make sure you sign up for free updates to learn the proven SEO strategies that I’m talking about:

[siteorigin_widget class="subscribe_Newsletter_Widget"][/siteorigin_widget]
[siteorigin_widget class="subscribe_Clients"][/siteorigin_widget]

item.title: Comprehensive Mobile App
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Our mobile app offers a selection of intent-based templates to help you create and send campaigns that suit your marketing needs right from your phone or tablet.

item.title: John Doe
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Amazing theme! All-in-one, clean code, amazing design, and really not hard to set up. Highly recommended for any kind of website.

item.title: Maria Garcia
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: I’ve used many themes in the past, GreatWall Pro is my favorite by far! It’s easy to use and everything I was looking for. Money well invested.

item.title: Robert Davis
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: One of the most robust and amazing themes I’ve ever worked with. I could use this for almost any client and endless possibilities!

item.title: Marketing Checklist
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: There are a lot of things you can do to grow your traffic and sales, but I’ll prioritize them for you, so that way you focus on what’s important and get results.

item.title: Content Marketing
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: The content marketing report will show you the popular articles on your blog as well as your competitors’ sites so that you can write content that goes viral.

item.title: SEO Analysis
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: If you want more search traffic, all you have to do is follow the website analysis report. It will point out all of the SEO errors you need to fix in order to increase your rankings.

item.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Start with pre-made templates and customize them to make them yours.

item.title: Yes / No Forms
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Create multi-step campaigns to improve conversions and sales.

item.title: Mobile-Friendly Popups
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Optimize your campaigns for smartphone and tablets.

item.title: Canvas
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Don't want pre-made design? Use a blank canvas to create your own.

item.title: Incredible Effects
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Choose from 100+ attention-grabbing animation and sound effects.

item.title: Custom Success Message
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Customize the Thank You message to further boost engagement.

item.title: Powerful Automation
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Our robust marketing automation makes sure your emails get to the right people at the right time. Target customers based on behavior, preferences, and previous sales.

item.title: Competitive Intelligence
item.dc:creator: Allen
item.content:encoded: Are you wondering why your competitors are doing better? Through the competitive analysis report, you’ll be able to dissect your competition and compete with them.
